Subjects: sermons, verse in; evils of the times
_description: On the evils of the times, in an English prose homilyñthree alliterative monorhyming lines

WorcF10.Transcription:
Louers in lust longyngMen in mischif mornyngand peple in prisoun
                    perisschyng
WorcF10.Note:
Follows after prose following second ‘Leche on þe lasours
                    lawfulliche…’ (3045).
